item.description:
So the holidays are long past and you made your annual New Year's resolution to diet. . . and you haven't started it yet. . . or maybe you did and gave up already. Either way, let's forget about "Diet Month" for one morning and indulge ourselves with the most delicious breakfast pastries I've found in the greater Boston area! What you see in the picture is a "kringle," one of the signature pastries at the Danish Pastry House, where you can also get a large assortment of teas and coffee drinks to accompany it. This place doesn't take reservations and gets very crowded on Sundays, which is why I thought of going there on a Saturday morning. Why not start our weekend off on a sugar high?

I can be persuaded to push the time back to 10 a.m if people request it but I think we will have a better chance of snagging a large table if we shoot for 9:30.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a Meetup tent card on the largest table I can find
item.name: Let's Go Danish for Breakfast
